page.title: 16Leisure around Deepcut
page.content: There is an Adventurer's Club for the young children which is rather like Sunday School, a Youth Club for the older children and a Wives Club for the mothers. Fathers sometimes go on fun runs, shoot on the range or go to the mess. Sometimes we can go and play tennis, squash and badminton. Blackdown School sometimes has a fair that everyone can come to and have tea, cakes and play some of the games and buy things. The Royal Army Ordnance Corps have a fun day and people can go and have some fun playing the games and taking part in activities like races. The are two swing parks for us and a field for playing football. Girls of 7 to 11 can go to the Brownies and girls of 11 to 16 can go to the Guides.
